name: Data Science
description: Learn Python, Machine Learning, and AI concepts.

name: Mobile App Development
description: Build Android and iOS apps using Flutter and React Native.

name: Cloud Computing
description: Understand AWS, Azure, and Google Cloud services.

name: Cybersecurity
description: Protect systems against cyber threats and attacks.

name: Artificial Intelligence
description: Explore AI, neural networks, and deep learning models.

name: Game Development
description: Create 2D and 3D games with Unity and Unreal Engine.

name: UI/UX Design
description: Learn design principles, Figma, and Adobe XD.

name: Blockchain Development
description: Master smart contracts, Ethereum, and Solidity.

name: Software Testing
description: Understand test automation, Selenium, and TDD.
